forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 69 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
As midnight softly embraces Downtown San Francisco, the city breathes a cool sigh under an envelope of mostly cloudy skies. The gentle north wind carries a hint of the ocean, stirring the tranquility of the streets. With the temperature settling around a mild 58 degrees, it is an invitation to wrap oneself in a light blanket—perhaps a sweater or a scarf for a leisurely stroll through dimly lit neighborhoods, where the echo of distant conversations dances with the crisp night air.

Looking toward the day ahead, expect the clouds to part gracefully as the sun asserts its presence, illuminating the city in warm hues. A high near 73 will bring an inviting warmth, though the afternoon will temper this with a cool descent to around 69. The northwest wind will continue its gentle presence, adding a refreshing touch that complements the day's brightness. As fog occasionally swathes the edges of the Golden Gate Bridge, revealing glimpses of its majesty, the marine layer may linger where the ocean meets the sky, but the heart of the city will bask under clear sunlight.

Today holds the promise of simple delights; a morning walk along the Embarcadero, where the glistening water meets your gaze, could awaken the senses. Alternatively, one might find comfort in a cozy café, sipping coffee while watching locals pass. For the more adventurous, a leisurely hike in the Presidio, with its trails weaving through sun-drenched trees, offers a rejuvenating escape. Dress in layers: a light sweater to fend off the morning chill, shifting to breathable attire as the sun reaches its zenith. Whatever the choice, the day unfolds in delightful simplicity—embrace it.
